name: Deconstruction
overview: Deconstruction is a very complete brick case ... more than 200 predefined levels (2 series of 100 level), 3 game modes (novice, amateur and pro), more than 40 different bonuses, different balls, a laser, enemas "awkward", .. different paddles, 3 different terrain shapes (curved, spherical and straight), Hi-Score saved (pro mode only). A level editor is also available so you can edit your own level (up to 5 sets of 100 levels each)
